name: IAMNEWS
overview:
iamnews is a global open newsroom powered by you. With iamnews anyone can assign news tasks. Everyone can participate.

It is for independent reporters, photographers, media moguls and anyone who wants to connect with reporters from the world and collaborate in the creation of news.
